kickstart.post:
/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr imgstorage-user img-storage /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr imgstorage-group img-storage /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add attr imgstorage-network local /usr/sbin/adduser img-storage -m /opt/rocks/bin/rocks sync users
admin_pass=$(< /dev/urandom tr -dc _A-Z-a-z-0-9 | head -c26) /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl add_user img-storage ${admin_pass} /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl add_vhost img-storage /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl set_permissions -p img-storage img-storage ".*" ".*" ".*" /usr/sbin/rabbitmqctl set_permissions -p img-storage admin ".*" ".*" ".*" echo "${admin_pass}" > /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq_img-storage.conf chmod 400 /opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq_img-storage.conf /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add sec_attr attr=img-storage_pw crypted=true value=/opt/rocks/etc/rabbitmq_img-storage.conf
# rabbitmq_img_pw is synced through rocks sync host sec_attr, not through 411. # see /var/opt/rocks/plugins on frontend
# setting default attribute to install daemon # all vm-container run the vm daemon /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr vm-container img_storage_vm true # all nas installs the nas daemon /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr nas img_storage_nas true /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr compute vm_container_zpool tank /opt/rocks/bin/rocks add appliance attr vm-container vm_container_zpool tank
